# User Story Title

## I want
[Goal or feature]

## For what?
[Benefit or reason]

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Criterion 1
- [ ] Criterion 2
- [ ] Criterion 3

## Additional Context
Any further details, images, mockups, or references.
